website_summaries.verdict: A top-selling eyeliner by a popular brand that earned a loyal customer base for providing decent wear. Rich colors look great and blend easily too.
pros: You aren't likely to get a racoon-eye look with this eyeliner, as it does a good job resisting smears
Mechanical, plus it has a built-in sharpener to give it a sharp tip
Can be used to make a thin line, or smudged with the built-in smudging tip for a softer look
cons: Questionable if it lives up to the advertised 16-hour wear, but it lasts longer than most in its class
Some reports of breakouts after application

website_summaries.verdict: Convenient mechanical pencil with built-in sharpener with long-wear formula. Black is especially popular for waterline wear.
pros: Easy application for those seeking low-maintenance liner options
Popular for its creamy color that is comparable to that of premium or luxury beauty brand liners
cons: Not ideal if you expect razor-sharp lines from an eyeliner, but still defines eyes quite nicely

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner..hands down!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyeliner! It's been my favorite for years but has recently prooven itself when i went through natural childbirth and lots and lots of crying and was picture perfect immediately after! Not a smudge!! You can't go wrong with this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Glide On
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this product. The color is perfect for daytime wear. It's there, but subtle. One of the best features is it GLIDES on---doesn't pull or tug at delicate eyelid skin---and on my 79 year old face--I need gentle!
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: Novice at this.
customer_reviews.text: I am experimenting with eyeliner for some color. Older and my lashes are are fading. I always thought that men with a little were sexy. Yeah I grew up in the 80s and if Depp can do it at his age then hey why not? This one is better than maybelline by far. I am sure that there are better out there but I am learning.
customer_reviews.author: Travis P. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, doesn't irritate eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have this eyeliner in several colors. I love that I can apply it in the morning and it basically lasts all day, but easily removed with makeup remover wipes at night. I also normally have a bit of an allergy when I use other brown eyeliners as I think it has something to do with the red dyes they use, but this one doesn't seem to bother me or irritate my eyes. Overall a good product, true to color and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki P.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay on at all.
customer_reviews.text: Nice color (white), but does not stay on at all. I was really excited to get this and to try it on. It looks really great on my bottom tear line and makes my eyes look bigger for about 20 minutes. But it doesn’t stay on at all. I have allergies and this just came off way too fast. If you have allergies that make your eyes water, I would go with a more waterproof eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Luke & Ashley Andersen

customer_reviews.title: For the price I expect it to glide on easily and dark
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expect it to glide on easily and dark, but after a few times it is drier and doesn't glide and looks dark grey, not carbon black. A few years ago it worked great consistently. It's suppose to last for 16 hours, but seems to fade and spread out after only a couple of hours. I don't even have oily skin and keep lotions away from my eye area, so not sure what the problem is.
customer_reviews.author: VZ

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner for this price point
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you will not find a better eyeliner. I have used this for years. It is almost as good as the Lancome, and is a third of the price. This will stay on all day, especially if you prime your eyes. I like the urban decay eye primer. I've used it for like ten years now. In this eye liner, I have always used carbon black or black. Black eyeliner is my thing. I hate liquid liner but you can get nearly the same effect with this pencil liner. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my eyes, ruined my contacts
customer_reviews.text: This is not pencil liner. It's smudgy and waxy like a crayon. Dissolved in my eyes and really hurt. Got stuck to my contact lenses and I had to throw out that pair.
customer_reviews.author: arizona123

customer_reviews.title: Good color, easy to use. Caused eye allergy on me.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this brand of liner for years. Maybe they changed the formula? I keep having an allergic reaction after using this one pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Pegrita

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP! APPLICATION IS AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: applies horrifically! thank god it comes with a “smugger” so you can try to make it look like it was done purposely. would NEVER buy this again. definitely DO NOT recommend. & the ONLY reason i ordered it in the first place was because of all the positive reviews! all lies people, this stuff is garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Smearing eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I work 12 hours shifts and I always have eyeliner all over at the end of my shift. I tried this eyeliner hoping it would only be on my eyelids at the end of my shift. It failed. It is not infallible and was under my eyes hours into the shift. Now I am trying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: This is the only eyeliner I will wear
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, and will pretty much only wear this as long as they keep making it. I have used multiple different eyeliners over the years, and this one is by far my favorite. I don't use the little smudge tool on the other end, but I love how it twists out the bottom and applies the same every single time. It's dark, and vibrant, and looks great. It DOES smudge easily and run when wet (like after a shower or the pool) but I don't care. i love it. Highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie ATop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Caused Sores on Eyelids!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner, and purchased it for myself at a local Target store. My Mom asked for me to get her an eyeliner like mine, so I check on Amazon, and purchased this one which was the same as mine. Just after a week of using this product, my Mom developed sores all over her eyelids. This item did not come in its original packaging, and I feel that it is not the product they describe it to be. Do not buy from this!!
customer_reviews.author: Fisher Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Stays on all day !!
customer_reviews.text: I gave 5 stars except for the water proof it's not supposed to be water proof I don't believe but this is the only eyeliner I wear and it stays on all day !!! It doesnt smudge and it looks great !! Will def order again!! Oh and it even stays on during our long Harley rides !! 👍😁 update this one inhad ordered smudges I had to reapply several time😏
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: All day smudge = raccoon eyes 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding eyeliner that actually lasts without looking like a raccoon. This liner did not work for me at all! All day long I had to wipe my eyes because it just smeared. I wish it didn't last all day because of that! Lol I will have to save up and by my Thrive eyeliner again! 🙃
customer_reviews.author: Andrea F

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality; fell apart after using once
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and was quite happy with it. The second time I tried to use it, it had fallen apart. The entire filling had come out, sticking to the inside of the cap. So when -in my surprise about where the filling had gone- closed and reopened the eyeliner, the filling stuck to the side of the pencil. Could have been a good product but longevity is 0.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s Okay
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, but it didn’t last too long on me. I have really watery eyes and it’s been so difficult to find a good eyeliner. That’s why I gave it a 4 star, because I feel like it’s not the eyeliner’s fault my eyes are so special lol. I thought this could’ve been the one, but it last a few hours. Not even an 8 hour work day for me. But again, my eyes are very watery so maybe it’ll work better for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this eye pencil
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t even get on my eye. It just crumbled and left white flakes, chunks on my face very disappointed in the quality of this pencil. If I didn’t try it I would return it
customer_reviews.author: NFC

customer_reviews.title: For the price? Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this exact eyeliner in stores but I thought maybe I could buy this online since I'm at school 24/7. Was it worth it? No. Upon opening the package I checked to see the amount of eyeliner that was inside of the tube and there was half of what there normally used to be. It did glide in my eye the exact same but for some reason would make my eyes water or sting for a few moments and I don't think that's normal. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: GreatLakesWoodsman

customer_reviews.title: Not dark at all
customer_reviews.text: I thought based on reviews this would go on dark and be able to use it in waterline but it is light. Not too happy. I got black color.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: the perfect pencil!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect color, goes on perfectly, creamy and smooth application, lasts all day... the perfect pencil. I have tried many other brands and this is by far the best, hands down. I don't like to spend a lot of money on my makeup but I like good quality products and this definitely fits the bill for me.
customer_reviews.author: andimac

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. It was mostly empty
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this several times and each time I got nothing. I scrolled it up and scrolled it down and up again. The problem is - it's empty. It's useless.
customer_reviews.author: maxie

customer_reviews.title: Changed but, not in a good way...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this eyeliner for years. Loved it. But, this last purchase revealed some changes. 1.) The crayon has become noticeably thinner. Which means your getting less product for the money. 2.) The crayon doesn't have the easy creamy quality it used to. Now its more like hard and waxy. Takes several passes to effectively apply. I won't be buying this again. Revlon color stay eyeliner is a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Clark

customer_reviews.title: Applies more easily and more smoothly than any other
customer_reviews.text: I have tried four different eyeliners of this type and been disappointed in how UN smoothly they go on - leaving dots and uneven marks that the smudger can't fix. However L'oreal's product is much better. It still could glide even more smoothly on the lids (the reason for 4 stars) but the small dots and uneven marks it leaves actually can be smoothed out by the smudger (or q-tip which sometimes works better). Plus the color is a true navy blue which is a particularly good choice for those of us with the shade of brown eyes that have a navy line around the iris.
customer_reviews.author: RMU

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice eyeliner, but I had to throw it out. I’m generally not allergic to brown ( purples and wine colors are the worst because they have red dye in them), but this must have enough red in it to cause a reaction. I experimented twice and double pink eye isn’t fun! So, if you have an allergy to those dyes, stay away. I love L’Oreal, but it’s not the first time I’ve had issues with the eye make up.
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: Love love love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love this liner, it’s dark and the smudger is awesome. I suck at doing makeup but the smudger makes it just a little easier to ...well... smudge lol gonna be my new go to liner ☺️☺️
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Lots of frustration trying to figure out how to open it!
customer_reviews.text: I tried repeatedly to open this but without success. I pulled and pulled. Attempted to unscrew both the bottom and top. So I was not able to use it. Wish the makers would give clearer instructions or make it simpler to open.
customer_reviews.author: MarySpi

customer_reviews.title: Harummmp!
customer_reviews.text: This eyliner is so hard that it is very difficult if not impossible to apply evenly when trying to line eyes. The crayon part of the pencil breaks easily. I was unable to download a return code as the return website automatically ordered another pencil delivered to me. I do not want this product as it doesn't work. I want a refund not a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: veronica a marshall

customer_reviews.title: A melted mess and won't roll
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product for years at Target and love it. With the current stay home rules, i purchased on Amazon. The product is melted and will not work. I cannot leave the house to return it. Would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: tabykat7

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, beautiful liner
customer_reviews.text: I like a lot of eyeliner. Like what most people would say is too much, but I believe you should do you, and not just with makeup. Anyway, I used a similar pencil for many years, but then I tried this one. After that, I just couldn't use the other one anymore! This eyeliner doesn't drag and catch on my skin, so it creates smooth lines. I can fill in between lashes with ease. I can pile on the liner to my heart's content. Definitely try this one- I think you'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Mancuso

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big LOreal fan so I’m a little biased. The product is easy to use especially having to twist the barrel. The eyeliner is easy to remove with a makeup remover (I use the Neutrogena makeup remover clothes). I could rate water resistance because I didn’t get wet or wash my face, so I really don’t know.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Galvin

customer_reviews.title: Major Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: I've never had an allergic reaction to makeup before but this eyeliner made my eyes swell up rally bad, even after having used it for a full week. Be careful if sensitive to things like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: eye infection
customer_reviews.text: I developed a terrible eye infection right after I started using this. Coincidence? Unlikely! I threw it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Like it not precise enough but opaque
customer_reviews.text: I like the twist top So it never needs sharpened but I hate not knowing when it’s about to run out. Not really much can be done about that tho. Can’t get crisp wings or cat eyes either
customer_reviews.author: AlliCatt

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I'd thought I'd found an affordable eyeliner that wont smudge or run while I was at work. I was wrong. This starts to run within an hour of application when I'm working. I am a nurse, and I do work hard however I'd hope itd last a little longer. I do love the brown black color. Gives good definition without being overbearing like black does with my fair skin tone. Decent if you dont mind touching up and reapplying.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rio

customer_reviews.title: All lies.
customer_reviews.text: Every time I use this it’s impossible to apply cleanly. It takes me forever to get matching eyes. Within a few hours I look like a raccoon with how much transfers ALL AROUND MY EYES. Possibly the WORST eyeliner I’ve ever used. “Never Fail” should be changed to “Always Fail”.
customer_reviews.author: Goldmama420

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t get the make up on and when I finally did (the thin layer that came on) looked more gray than black. Had to do to Walmart during this pandemic just to get some eye liner! Waste!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Drugstore Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: One of the best drugstore pencil eyeliners. I have creapy skin on my eyelids so it’s tricky to find a pencil that goes on easily and doesn’t bleed or transfer onto my brow bone. Goes on easily and stays well without smudging throughout the day. I still have to clean up the corners of my eyes after a few hours and then every few hours thereafter. Cleans up easily and still looks good. The other pencil eyeliner I like is Rimmel Exaggerate.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Nice formula but breaks easily with the sharpener.
customer_reviews.text: I'm torn. The actual formula of the eyeliner is nice. It doesnt smudge and doesnt rub off on my upper eyelid. But it's way too soft to use the built in sharpener. It tends to break off in the sharpener which leaves the pencil flat, so it's hard to get a really fine line. I think I'll look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this eyeliner, but it just doesn't work well for me. Application feels a bit chalky, picks up other product, and drags, while the color can apply inconsistently and won't always fully show without going over and over the line (carbon black). It smudges easily, and may work well when used as a lighter color and for a more lived in or smokey eye. Also package is cheap - the smudge end fell out (and keeps falling out) just picking up the liner.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Askham

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again !
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the $20 ish dollar name brand from major beauty supply store I have been getting. Doesn’t run under my eye. Stays put. The only neg is that I have to reapply in the afternoon. It’s really not an all day wear. But def will be using this one for now on and saving my money !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaki

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, easy,effective, GREAT !
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, the white is Awesome at the brow bone to hi-lite, and it kicks butt on the inner corner of the eyes, the black or white is fantastic for tight lining, the opposite end is THE BEST to smudge it out its almost like a soft but firm perfectly angled rubber tip that is easily sanitized with a cotton round with alcohol GREAT PRODUCT !
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: The pencil is soft and works great. I really don’t like the sharpener at the end. I have put the clear cap over the pencil by mistake which mashes the eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: anniez

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought the waterproof eyeliner in a different color and it stays all day. I couldn't find navy in stores so I ordered it from Amazon, but the product wasn't available in waterproof, and it's not as easy to apply as the waterproof type.
customer_reviews.author: luna

customer_reviews.title: Super dark on waterline! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I’ve been purchasing this for years! I’m really picky about my eyeliner...I want it dark, easy to apply and I don’t like sharpening...so this is an all-in-one for me. I only use it for my waterline so I’m not sure how well it does on the top lids. It lasts all day on my waterline with very little smudging. I highly recommend this eyeliner if you’re looking for something easy to apply!
customer_reviews.author: Mark James DelMundo

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today in a blink from PrimeDay. I immediately had to try it out and was SO happy! I'm 73 and finding an eyeliner that doesn't pull is almost impossible. This one did the trick. You can bet I'll be buying more. What a treat! Smooth, silky, no pulling!
customer_reviews.author: JennyDTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy this. Buy L'Oreal Paris Makeup Infallible PRO-LAST Pencil Eyeliner instead.
customer_reviews.text: Not smudgeproof. I don't recommend this at all. Buy this instead- L'Oreal Paris Makeup Infallible Pro-Last Pencil Eyeliner. Completely different product. They're both called "infallible" but so very different. It's worth the sharpening effort.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Best out there for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Without dropping a lot of money, this is the best that is out there. Unfortunately, it still rubs away. I wear contacts and blink a lot to wet my eyes. And eye drops seem to be a makeup remover... Therefore my eyeliner keeps smudging away - especially the waterline.
customer_reviews.author: xmaschc

customer_reviews.title: The world's best new eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I was considering getting permanent eyeliner because no matter what I do, my eyeliner tends to fade or smear or wear off by the end of a day. I decided to try this because the packaging said it was smudge-resistent and lasts for 16 hours. I realize it's what companies do when marketing or advertising, they promise the product is the best, and sometimes it's not, but in this case, it really is. I am very impressed. At this point, I have stopped considering permanent eyeliner, as long as L'Oreal keeps making Infallible eyeliners. I have bought them in almost every color and each one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: All time favorite by far! Stays put!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very hard time finding an eyeliner that doesn’t creep down to my under eye. As I get older this problem only gets worse. I have tried all the eyeliners that say lasts all day and stays put. This is by far the winner and a great price and value. This is the winner by far.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeliner! It usually last me all day! Good black color & Easy to use. I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: ... of this kind of eyeliner is that it's incredibly easy to apply and doesn't require a lot of precision
customer_reviews.text: The advantage of this kind of eyeliner is that it's incredibly easy to apply and doesn't require a lot of precision. It's easy to take off as well. However, it tends to smudge off during the day, especially if you sweat or have oily eyelids. Also, it's not nearly as dark as liquid liner and you can't make really clear, precise lines. Once the tip dulls, that also diminishes your line's precision, as you can't really sharpen it like a pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Kris E.

customer_reviews.title: Decent eye liner
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok eyeliner, but not particularly smooth, or rich color. The "dark brown" ended up being far too light for me and so it doesn't give enough depth, contrast. Perhaps if I had a darker shade I would like it better? In the meantime I'll go back to my trusty l'Oreal Liquid liner which lasts far longer, with deeper color.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Check to see if it is sealed safely
customer_reviews.text: Eyeliner came opened. The shipping box was still intact. Someone opened it. I won't use a opened eyeliner, esp. with this virus out here.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Good Color
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my Halloween costume and it worked great. It’s not watery and goes on with a nice color on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is terrible. Within a few hours there was nothing left on my eyes. I have cheaper brands that work 1000 times better. I’m a makeup freak, and subscribe to ipsy and Birchbox and tried them all! Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: gingie7

customer_reviews.title: Runs and smudges very easily.
customer_reviews.text: The eyeliner looks great when it's first applied and for about an hour after. I notice after a while that it starts smudging and looks like it "running" under my eyes. And the fullness of the line I made just slowly gets less noticeable. Its like it's slowly disappearing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey T.

customer_reviews.title: Great! Lasts all day and no smudging!
customer_reviews.text: Originally picked this up at a local retailer when traveling as I'd forgot to pack my usual liner. While it was meant to be "good enough" for now, I've discovered I love this product as it lasts all day! I've never had a liner last, even the most expensive. Purchased another here for the same price as the local store and had it in 2 days w/Amazon prime-so convenient!
customer_reviews.author: bbg

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this eyeliner and the color is perfect for me. This product by L'Oreal is easy to blend but stays put for an extended time. I have had allergies (burning eyes/ tearing) when I've used similar eyeliners but I have no issues with this product.
customer_reviews.author: P. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for many years. It is as good or better than more expensive, high end eyeliners. There is no point in wasting money on other eyeliners. If you want a smooth eyeliner that lasts, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: For what I used it for it didn’t work well. I used it under my eyelid and it is very dark, however it smudged easily and was hard to get off my under eye. I’m not sure how this would work for regular eyeliner. The blendy thing on the back also ha a sharpener which is cool. Stayed on for a while once I tried to rub it off
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Geer

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that the point was not able to be sharpened ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the point was not able to be sharpened after is has been used and now there is a flat tip. After using a few times, maybe 6 or 7 the point won't twist up at all. So now it's trash. Very disappointed in this L'Oreal product.
customer_reviews.author: grammysue

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner because it's easy to apply for beginners like me.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived opened and used
customer_reviews.text: I love the brand. But when this pencil arrived, it was already opened and used. Absolutelydisgusting. I will not chance using this on my face. Return started. UPS is taking a long time to pick it up though...
customer_reviews.author: Nadine B.

customer_reviews.title: Not infallible but.. okay.
customer_reviews.text: I still do not believe that a never fail eyeliner even remotely exists. As a woman who works outdoors I have yet to find an eyeliner that stays on throughout the day. This product does tend to smear throughout the day even with primer and setter. It is easy to apply, comes with a blender and a sharpener. The application is smooth and the color is as described. Compares well to similar eyeliners.
customer_reviews.author: Paperclipnovel

customer_reviews.title: Glides On
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Glides on with no tugging. Smudgeproof. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZONGIRL

customer_reviews.title: eyeliner really is infallible and really does stay on all day
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase this item from Walmart, but when I learned it was available via Amazon, I jumped for joy! This eyeliner really is infallible and really does stay on all day. I have laughed and cried and fell asleep with this eyeliner on and it stays in place. I love it! I now have one in my office, my car and at home so I am always prepared. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Locke

customer_reviews.title: No smearing or melting
customer_reviews.text: I prefer an eyeliner pencil because it's easier to apply. However, many pencil eyeliners "melt," so that you have colored shadows under your eyes by the end of the day. I tried this eyeliner because it was recommended by Good Housekeeping magazine as an inexpensive option for "no smear" eyeliner. I have been very happy about how this eyeliner stays in place. It's also very easy to apply - while the pencil includes a built-in sharpener, you turn to extend the pencil, so a fresh point is always available. I liked the fact that the eyeliner is available in different colors. I purchased "slate" to complement my lavender eye shadow.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: meh, there are plenty of better options out there for the same price
customer_reviews.text: it's alright. but i expected better. The color is not very strong and black. you have to apply several times for the color to really be black but even then its not black. as others have said, its more like dark grey. so beware. but i guess it could be worse. Would not buy again though. there are plenty of better options out there for the same price
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: L’Oreal makes great products for women
customer_reviews.text: I have use the L’Oreal products for years. The French know how to make women look good. I have never been disappointed with anything from L’Oreal.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Rountree

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two eeeks
customer_reviews.text: The color was fairly close to what my other taupe brow pencil is like. However the pencil only lasted 2 weeks. I am thinking this may have been defective. I am going to give it another chance this time with a light brown. I will write another review when I try again.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne M Turner

customer_reviews.title: I don't really wear eye liner much.
customer_reviews.text: I don't really wear eye liner that often, but this one was very easy to apply and the little smug thing on the end worked great when I did mess up a line. Made it come right off! Not sure that's what it is meant for, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tip Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this but it smudges and the tip broke during the first use
customer_reviews.author: D.A

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner! I’ve always spent a lot of money on good eyeliner and wanted to find something cheaper. Saw an article online about this kind and gave it try. Best decision I ever made. It works amazing. Goes on smooth and stays on throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeliner! I searched for years to find an eyeliner I liked the color of that didn’t smudge during a normal work day. With this, even on summer weekends when I’m out and sweating it generally stays put. Not perfect, but for the price it’s the best I’ve found by far.
customer_reviews.author: Jill A. Jefts

customer_reviews.title: Smudges and runs!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner totally smudges, runs and causes racking eyes, even if I "set" it with powder eyeshadow. It's so hard to find eyeliner that doesn't do this nowadays! This is going on the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Tip was ruined and rounded due to no packaging
customer_reviews.text: The tip is too rounded to make a thin line. Mine arrived without it being inside a cardboard package. It was loose, inside the envelope. When I went to use it, you could see that the tip was damaged, and the "smude part" was also bent and flopping. Not worth sending it back. I am not buying make-up from anyone that is not AMAZON. Why would anyone take the eyeliner out of its packaging, and send it to you as if it were a #2 pencil? It could be contaminated since it is wide open. My gosh, the things people do to make a quick buck.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Good mascara
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner i have found so far. I wear it to work on my 12 hr shifts and by the end of my 12 hrs ill have just a little in the corner of my eyes. Unlike my other eye liners where it looks like I've cried all day...
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hall

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: While the pencil glides on easily it's somewhat greasy, a lesser quality than what's found in discount stores which is saying something. The spongy applicator on the reverse end is rough and difficult to use. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: speckled hen

customer_reviews.title: it does not stay on.
customer_reviews.text: it does not stay on. when you first put it on looks good, in an hour it is gone. For a L Oreal product its a failure. should have stayed with lacquer liner 24h infallible, it stayed on.
customer_reviews.author: 900plus

customer_reviews.title: Kinda good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this but it’s not completely smudgeproof nor does it last really long, I would rather have senegence brand but that is ridiculously pricey so I’ll stick with this one
customer_reviews.author: calgal

customer_reviews.title: Love product - don't leave in heat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner! It doesn't smudge, it goes well in the water, it lasts a very long time, but I live in AZ, and fair warning, don't leave it in the heat of your car because even if it's brand new it will melt inside the dispenser and then you have to buy a whole new one because the product won't come out anymore...
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: My wife puts this on, it makes her look like a girl. I get excited. Wear this if you want men, or women, to get excited about how your eyes look. . . She does have nice eyes, both of them.
customer_reviews.author: ü áíôçñïðùò êáêüò

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft lines
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is perfectly fine if you like a soft, smudged look. It is sharp out of the package and then never again, but that's fine; it seems to go on smoothly and it lasts, although I usually use it with a primer base. The slate is a nice charcoal gray color, which I prefer to black on my fair skin.
customer_reviews.author: B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was bit skeptical but its exactly what I was looking for. Perfect color, good price, electronic pencil does not require sharpening. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Vouloumanos

customer_reviews.title: Bag of NOPE
customer_reviews.text: Literally started melting off the waterline almost immediately. I don’t know how someone who reviewed this went through childbirth without it running or smudging.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: I broke off the tip when I tried to sharpen it - attachment on end of pencil - removable with spreader which works great but I prefer to use my finger
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin so it is important to use a primer for eyes prior to applying. I broke off the tip when I tried to sharpen it - attachment on end of pencil - removable with spreader which works great but I prefer to use my finger.
customer_reviews.author: Thatgirl

customer_reviews.title: Used for waterline
customer_reviews.text: I am NOT good at eyeliner, so I wanted a product I could use on my tightline/waterline alone. This worked fantastic, went on smoothly without smudging and did not run under my eyes at all.
customer_reviews.author: R. G.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: It goes on easily, but gives me raccoon eyes. I just wipe it off and I will be good to go. The color fades throughout the day. By the time I'm home from work there is just a faint brown line. Other than that, I am happy with it and can't complain. I have this color in both brown and black.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Softer than black, perfect color to bring out my eyes w/o being harsh.
customer_reviews.text: I never hesitate to buy a L’oreal Infallible product and this doesn’t disappoint. The charcoal color isn’t harsh, and I love using the tip to smudge my liner a bit. It lasts as long as any liner I have used and i’m Using it in the humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Bella DeBaul

customer_reviews.title: It's ok...but not as good as the Lancome Le Stylo Waterproof Pencil
customer_reviews.text: I love the Lancome Le Stylo Waterproof pencil. But, I didn't want to buy into the idea that expensive was always better, so I tried this pencil. After a week, I decided that the Lancome pencil is worth it. I'm keeping this to use as a backup, but won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Adler

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I normally stick to liquid eyeliner because it's the only thing that stays on. This goes on really good and stays on. Also gives a much softer look.
customer_reviews.author: A Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It seems like it kind of "goop's up," leaving little bits instead of going on smoothy like black liner does. I'm struggling finding a good white liner. I was disappointed, and don't use it.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Okay quality
customer_reviews.text: I like that you don't have to sharpen this eyeliner, however the quality is just okay. I put it on my waterline and by mid day it's running under my bottom lashes. Also sometimes it feels sticky. If you wear contacts it could get on the contacts and the mark is hard to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Smudges and spreads ! Terrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Smudges and spreads all around ☹️☹️☹️. Doesn’t seem like original product . Please don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: P. PATEL

customer_reviews.title: Great smudge proof eyeliner for an even better price!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new eyeliner that didn’t smear by the end of the day and this one did not disappoint!! Super surprised that an eyeliner at this price could outlast brands that I have paid much more for!! Highly recommend for full day use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen E. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Good soft eyeliner with great pigment - a true dark brown
customer_reviews.text: Pigment is really good, however, it will not last a full 8 hours. Has tendency to run if you have slightly oily skin, which nearly everyone does around the eyes.It works really well as in inner-eye lid liner because the liner is very soft - you don't have to warm it before applying. Given its softness you will not get a very precise line, even after sharpening, but it blends well for smudging purposes if you want a soft, blendable eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: amazonmakeslifeeasier

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Great eyeliner that does not run off my eyelids in our hot, humid Florida weather. I love the color. I have light brown eyes and this color is perfect. Dark enough but not to contrasting.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Riddle

customer_reviews.title: The world's best new eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: I was considering getting permanent eyeliner because no matter what I do, my eyeliner tends to fade or smear or wear off by the end of a day. I decided to try this because the packaging said it was smudge-resistent and lasts for 16 hours. I realize it's what companies do when marketing or advertising, they promise the product is the best, and sometimes it's not, but in this case, it really is. I am very impressed. At this point, I have stopped considering permanent eyeliner, as long as L'Oreal keeps making Infallible eyeliners. I have bought them in almost every color and each one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: work
customer_reviews.text: much easier to order this item on amazon than to try and find it in a retail store. I find the product easy to use and covers my eyeliner mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: MMH

product_meta.title: L'Oreal Paris Makeup Infallible Never Fail Original Mechanical Pencil Eyeliner with Built in Sharpener, Black, 1 Count
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Count| Color:BlackCreate classic to bold eye designs with Infallible Never Fail Mechanical Eyeliner. The rich and creamy formula glides on easily and evenly for fade-proof color that stays all day. Use the built-in Smudger and sharpener to create versatile eye looks for any occasion. Packaging may vary. What you receive may not be what is reflected on site. Mechanical Pencil Eyeliner Rich, Crème Formula Built in Sharpener and Smudger Smudge-proof, Up to 16HR 16-hour wear Apply along lash line starting from inner corner of eye working outwards. For a smoky look, gently smudge line with built-in smudger. Warning: Eye cosmetics in a scratched, infected or irritated eye and scratches from cosmetic eye applicators can lead to eye damage, and in extreme cases, even blindness. If your eye is scratched, stop using all eye cosmetics and go to an ophthalmologist immediately. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle.

BRAND STORY
By L'Oreal Paris
feature_bullets: INFALLIBLE NEVER FAIL SMUDGE-PROOF EYELINER: Mechanical pencil eyeliner with built in sharpener is formulated to glide on easily and stay put for up to 16hrs. This rich, creamy eye pencil delivers long-lasting fade-proof color
NEVER FAIL EYE LINER: Glides on to create classic to bold eye designs to compliment any mood or occasion. Use the built-in sharpener and smudge to optimize pencil tip for versatile eye looks.

CREATE YOUR PERFECT EYE MAKEUP LOOK with our collection of Voluminous mascaras, achieve sleek lines with smudge-proof eyeliner, define your brows and discover eyeshadow palettes with shades made for every eye color

BECAUSE YOU'RE WORTH IT: L'Oreal Paris Makeup helps you create the look you want with our full line of makeup including foundations, concealers, highlighter makeup, brow pencils, eyeshadow palettes, lipsticks and much more
PERFECT TO PAIR WITH: Voluminous Original Volume Building Mascara, uniquely formulated to resist clumping, soften and build lashes up to 5X their natural thickness
